verses.verse: And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> on you, the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H7725>call<s%> them to <S%H3824>mind<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5080>driven<s%> you,

And shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>children,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

That then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on you, and will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6327>scattered<s%> you.

<S%H518>If<s%> any of your be <S%H5080>driven<s%> out to the <S%H7097>outmost<s%> parts of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> you, and from <S%H8033>there<s%> will he <S%H3947>fetch<s%> you:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3423>possessed,<s%> and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; and he will do you <S%H3190>good,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you above your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> that you may <S%H2416>live.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H423>curses<s%> on your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> you.

And you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will make you <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land,<s%> for <S%H2896>good:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you for <S%H2896>good,<s%> as he <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H1>fathers:<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

For <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> it is not <S%H6381>hidden<s%> from you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> is it <S%H7350>far<s%> off.

It is not in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that you should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up for us to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it to us, that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it?

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> is it <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that you should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for us, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it to us, that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it?
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to you, in your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that you may <S%H6213>do<s%> it.
<S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> and <S%H7451>evil;<s%>

In that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

But <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> away, so that you will not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> but shall be <S%H5080>drawn<s%> away, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them;

I <S%H5046>denounce<s%> to you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish,<s%> and that you shall not <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>record<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against you, that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and <S%H7045>cursing:<s%> therefore <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> that both you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> may <S%H2421>live:<s%>

That you may <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and that you may <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and that you may <S%H1692>hold<s%> to him: for he is your <S%H2416>life,<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of your <S%H3117>days:<s%> that you may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them.
